/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings exhibiting a modern architectural style, their facades adorned with balconies and large windows that reflect the overcast sky. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, stand tall against the gray sky, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. Cars parked along the street hint at the city's vibrant transportation system. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
